Certification is done. :We're almost there with the completion of Almond Guard development. :Here are pictures of Almond 3S Prototypes: [https://mobile.twitter.com/Securifi/status/981175948769771520/photo/1 Photos] </small> *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/AHL-ALMOND3S AHL-ALMOND3S] (2018-02-15) {{FCC ST|08/14/2018|indexme.}}
===Technical Specifications=== *Wireless: 802.11abgn/ac (AC1200), Mesh Networking *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 2x LAN GbE, 1x USB 2.0, *Professional Monitoring, DIY Self Monitoring *24/7 Alarm Response, Battery ([https://fccid.io/AHL-ALMOND3S/Operational-Description/Tech-Spec-OP-DESC-3754625 3.7V]) Backup, Siren *Home Automation: ZigBee (HA 1.2), Z-Wave (with USB dongle) *Power Supply: DC 12V/2.5A (Input: AC 100~240V, 1A, 50/60Hz)
====Multi-Purpose==== :Router / Access Point / Range Extender / Wireless Bridge *Router or AP - works with any Internet modem from any provider *Range Extender - wirelessly extend your existing Wi-Fi network *Wireless Bridge - connect wired only devices to a Wi-Fi network
